MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the KY3 area of Burntisland, affecting properties in Burnside Avenue. It will be necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 2:30pm due to repairs required to our underground electricity network on Burnside Avenue and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 7pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 1:48pm on Sunday, 06 December 2020
